item.title: Wall Street firm downgrades AMD — but says it's not because of DeepSeek
item.description: Melius Research lowered its rating to a hold on the chipmaker.

item.title: Buy this biotech stock that can rally more than 65%, Goldman says
item.description: The firm opened coverage of the stock at a buy.

item.title: Barclays upgrades Victoria's Secret, says retailer can rally more than 40%
item.description: The firm upgraded shares to overweight from equal weight.

item.title: Tuesday’s big stock stories: What’s likely to move the market in the next trading session
item.description: The Nasdaq Composite slid more than 3% on Monday as China's DeepSeek spurred a sell-off in AI-related plays. Here's what's on CNBC's radar for Tuesday...

item.title: Tom Lee says market sell-off sparked by DeepSeek was an overreaction, as Nvidia suffers its worst day since 2020
item.description: The Nasdaq Composite fell more than 3%, while the S&P 500 dropped 1.5% on Monday. Nvidia contributed to the losses, tanking nearly 17%.
